text: I engaged Nippon Paint’s services as I believe they are one of the best paint company in Singapore. They are very efficient & replied to my inquiries promptly. Thank you so much for fulfilling my request & getting the job done as soon as possible before my bed arrives 👍🏼 The painter did an excellent job & I am extremely happy & satisfied with the paint work too! Thank you Mr. Ken’s Team 🙏🏼💯 (Before & After Comparison Photos)

My absolute favourite paint store. Aunty is very friendly and extremely helpful. Top level customer service and very reasonable prices, $25 for 1 liter of V5000 paint. Highly recommended.
Sale man who are very nice talk about how many color paint we need it . Good service!

We've been getting our paints here for the past year or so, and Diana from the team provides excellent customer service and even delivers the paints for an affordable rate!
